survey_name: Corporate Carbon Footprint Reduction Initiatives Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the effectiveness and awareness of corporate carbon footprint reduction initiatives.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with our company's carbon footprint reduction initiatives?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for familiarity levels. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with our company's carbon footprint reduction initiatives?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which of the following carbon reduction initiatives are you aware of? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Remote work options to reduce commuting
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Ensure the options are clear and concise.

script.question_text: Which of the following carbon reduction initiatives are you aware of? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Remote work options to reduce commuting

questions.question_text: How effective do you think our company's carbon reduction initiatives are?

script.question_text: How effective do you think our company's carbon reduction initiatives are?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: What additional carbon reduction initiatives would you like to see implemented?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which of the following barriers prevent you from participating more in carbon reduction initiatives? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears if Q5 response is 'Sometimes', 'Rarely', or 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with an optional open text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following barriers prevent you from participating more in carbon reduction initiatives? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears if Q5 response is 'Sometimes', 'Rarely', or 'Never'.

questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for motivation levels. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How motivated are you to participate in carbon reduction initiatives?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: What incentives would encourage you to participate more in carbon reduction initiatives?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears if Q7 response is 'Somewhat motivated', 'Neutral', 'Not very motivated', or 'Not at all motivated'.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What incentives would encourage you to participate more in carbon reduction initiatives?
script.routing_logic: This question appears if Q7 response is 'Somewhat motivated', 'Neutral', 'Not very motivated', or 'Not at all motivated'.

questions.question_text: Do you believe our company communicates its carbon reduction initiatives effectively?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question with an 'I'm not sure' option. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.
